title: FontHaus
content:
Font retailer FontHaus was formed in 1989 by [Mark Solsburg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231118/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mark%20Solsburg) and is run by [DsgnHaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231118/http:/typophile.com/wiki/DsgnHaus) in Westport, CT.

FontHaus offers over 45,000 fonts from top foundries [Adobe](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231118/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adobe), [Agfa](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231118/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Agfa), [Bitstream](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231118/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Bitstream), [Cool Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231118/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Cool%20Fonts), [E+F](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231118/http:/typophile.com/wiki/E%2BF), [Emigre](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231118/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Emigre), [Font Bureau](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231118/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Font%20Bureau), [Lucas](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231118/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lucas), [Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231118/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Linotype), [MvB](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231118/http:/typophile.com/wiki/MvB), and [URW](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231118/http:/typophile.com/wiki/URW).

FontHaus publishes [x-height magazine](http://web.archive.org/web/20150204231118/http:/typophile.com/wiki/x-height%20magazine).
author: James Grieshaber
